title: Panel Discussion: Diversity in Cybersecurity
description:
Panel Discussion: Diversity in Cybersecurity



Panel Members:
- Vandana Verma
- Shira Shamban
- Hitesh Dharmdasani
- Judy Ngure

PyCon India is the largest gathering of Pythonistas in India for the Python programming language. 
The 13th edition of PyCon India took place online from 17th Sept to 20th Sept 2021.

Talk Detail: https://in.pycon.org/blog/2021/diversity-in-cybersecurity-panel-discussion.html
